import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { skills, iskills, iprojekts, projekts } from './skills'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { skills: Array = skills; projekts: Array = projekts; }
